entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement `IParsable<TSelf>` et cetera on `IPEndPoint` #114405
  • [infra][maccatalyst] Fix IO test compatibility issues occurring on MacCatalyst CI with macOS 14 #114403
  • [wasm][interpreter] interpreter splat intrinsics fail #114401
    10.0.0
  • Test build warning: Reference to undeclared extern assembly 'mscorlib'. Attempting autodetect #114397
    10.0.0
  • DllImport Unable to Load Native Library After .NET Upgrade #114393
  • Build warnings: "Could not resolve reference..." #114390
    10.0.0
  • [mono-runtime] runtime build on mainline is taking very long time on s390x #114389
  • [wasm coreclr] build BCL for coreclr/wasm #114379
    Future
  • Cannot suppress obsolete or experimental errors that use a custom diagnostic ID #114377
  • Contract violation in SetupOleContext #114372
    10.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #114370
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 12 Regressions on 4/5/2025 12:48:28 AM +00:00 #114382
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/3/2025 2:37:57 PM +00:00 #114384
  • [Perf] Regressions from increasing inline budget #114383
  • HybridCache and L1 memory usage #114366
  • [API Proposal]: String.Manipulation generic overloads with ReadOnlySpan<T> #114365
  • Non-zero result of Vector3.Cross with parallel vectors #114361

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b12795/b12795/b12795.cmd #113458
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/dev10/b400791/_b400971b400971/_b400971b400971.cmd #113457
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/dev10/b400791/_b400971b400971/_b400971b400971.cmd #114178
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/LocallocLarge_d/LocallocLarge_d.dll #113459
    10.0.0
  • [Unified Build] Unsigned .js files in runtime artifacts #114353
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5] Failed to build the retargeted paint.net with CS0104 and CS8377 #114115
  • JIT: `InstanceBasedFunctionPointer(useExplicitThis: True)` test fails with tailcallstress #114213
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SerializeAsync with Utf8JsonWriter #114373
  • Discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #49674
    Future
  • Support precompiling CCW vtables in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114024
  • [API Proposal]: 'ComWrappers' methods to get runtime-provided 'IUnknown' CCW vtable entries #114133
  • Blazor Server vs WASM - different output on `enumerable is ICollection<int>` #111147
  • C++ include guards under src\gc need cleanup for portability #3975
  • [API Proposal]: Add RemoveFirst/RemoveLast of `List<T>` #114319
  • No support in ExpandoObject for case-insensitive #41831
  • [RFC] Sanitizer support #42361

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark profiler\DynamicOptimization test JitOptimizationSensitive #114417
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Prepare cert tests for new signing algorithms #114416
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][interp] Fix PackedSimd.Splat intrinsic lookup #114413
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • XML documentation for `ProviderAliasAttribute` improved. #114408
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use 'ref readonly' in 'Unsafe.AsPointer' #114406
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][interp] Add Round alias #114399
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add ability to raise `AppDomain.UnhandledException` event. #114392
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114391
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • WIP #114388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch OSR patchpoint identity to <func version, IL offset> #114381
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use pipe streams for redirected console #114378
    area-System.Console
  • Extend type preinitialization support #114374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add RTCHECK node for compiler-inserted runtime check code #114369
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Add github notifications for code owners #114367
    needs-area-label
  • Add WebSocketStream #114363
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make host trace to `<exe_name>.<pid>.log` if `COREHOST_TRACEFILE` is set to a directory #114362
    area-Host
  • ML-KEM: PEM Exports (and missing overloads) #114360
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114414
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114415
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #114396
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #114398
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [riscv] Fix build break of riscv #114394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Comment out workloads job in runtime-official.yml #114411
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm][interp] Add the opcodes to the widening intrinsics #114395
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Split Regression_1 into new Regression_7 #114400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp with RequiresDynamicCode #114346
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ML-KEM: EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo exports #114304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Split JIT.CodeGenBringUpTests to fix Alpine runs #114376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable workloads build, it happens in the sdk repo now #114386
    needs-area-label
  • Test build fix #114375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Bit counting intrinsics #114337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Extend static constructor interpreter to support vtable-like structures #114354
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip rarely-run block expansion during flow opts when we have profile data #114311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update HttpTelemetry.Redirect helper visibility #114349
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [perf build] Added possibility to store metadata about latest built PERF build #113978
    perf-pipeline, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Count `EXPLICITTHIS` args correctly in tailcall stress #114368
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #114101
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [clr-interp] Refactor passing of configuration environment variables #114300
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Call build.cmd directly from build.sh #114341
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix inadvertently upgrading compiler warnings to errors #114335
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix inadvertently upgrading compiler warnings to errors #114331
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][interp] alias Vector operators to PackedSimd #114293
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Disable wasm linux library tests which are failing due to infrastructure #114347
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [android] Fix android-x64 build on Windows #114342
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Ensure proper interpreter frames ordering #114418
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2682560 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix stack overflow caused by very deep parent/child Task chains #113407
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • SVE: Slightly better calculation of stack frame for ldr/str #114284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add note on stack security (GS) #114356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic divide (take2) #114352
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace CodeManState with cache in EECodeInfo for x86. #114170
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Initial runtime support #112323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Reset ZLibStreamHandle when parsing concatenated GZip streams #113587
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce background GC allocations #114320
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.5
  • [mono] Switch simdhash to prime bucket counts; increase load factor #113274
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove useless assert from assertprop #114332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Ignore DefaultCredentials when doing Basic & Digest auth in SocketsHttpHandler #113728
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • ILLink : Fix and a couple tweaks #114215
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix for XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #114200
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm coreclr] simplify build #114111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 135.0.7049.52, windows: 135.0.7049.42 #114303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [S.N.Quic] Observe exceptions in ResettableValueTaskSource #114226
    area-System.Net.Quic
